This was drawn a week ago but I thought I might as well show it to you guys. I wanted to make a follow up to the previous Pin-up battle bird drawing. I hope you like it, I really enjoyed coloring this one.

WRITING.TITLE: Battle Bird II, Pens and Markers, A4

WRITING.TEXT: Oh, and thank you!
Haha this is great!
Thank you :)
Haha well that could be what they are, I dont even know what things are at the time I draw them, I just draw what feels right :)
Hehe no Im not into ornithology but I love to draw birds, I think birds in general looks awesome.
I was actually not trying to hide her but I have understood that a lot of people dont see her at first :) Thank you
But she is the best part haha!
Glad to hear that! I really appreciate it, thank you :)
Thanks! Well there can be two stupid looking faces even. One on the actuall pin-up and one where the boobs would be eyes
correct!
Not a super duper fan of pro markers, they are good but I like the way copics flow. They fit my way of drawing.

I used pro markers before I used copics and they did not work for me. They dont flow the way I want them to. However you can use colour pencils and then use a skin colored pro marker to smooth them out.
What do you want me to do? haha
Because there is more then one sort of Pen, there are Calligraphy pens for example.
Haha great :) Ill be waiting
That is partly the reason indeed :)

Ghost in the shell when it came out was a huge part of me wanting to get better when I was younger, I just looked at that movie and thought "ooookey so this is how good I want to be" The background artwork in that first movie is mind boggling.
Nope, I just came to think of a color combination I wanted to do and then the shapes that would fit it happened.
Its the very cheap pilot Hi-tec ballpoint pen
Yea you might be right, What would be awesome for me is to make a snowboard graphic some day :)
Not that I can remember :/
Hard to answer, some random paper from a Swedish supplier who seem to work for me. Its not made for markers but it works for me.
This one comes from the Kiwi family so no wings! :)
Yepp, you can find links under the image on imgur. Its pretty much instagram who have turned into my galleri :)
They sure are, they ruin me haha. But its worth it.
Dont know the brand of the color pencil, its random ones I got. The base layer is copic marker.
Could be oil but not sure to be honest.
No its a horrible drawn pin-up ;)
That kind of happens by itself, or maybe magic, it cooould be magic.
The pipes are eeh, exhaust I guess haha
Haha thanks, a lot of people dont notice the pin-up, I think its the best part of the whole drawing :D
Haha I got a scanner man ;)
Haha, Thanks man!

Hi-tec pilot ballpoint pen Paper is a sketchbook from a Swedish office supplies thingy so if you dont live in Sweden you cant get your hands on it. I have relatives sending me sketchbooks when I run out as I cant buy them in Japan. For colors I use copics and color pencils.
Yes they are much fun indeed them copics, Just keep practicing youll get better and better! I moved to Japan 2 years ago so you will have to travel to Tokyo if you want a tattoo :)
Haha thats great to hear that you are telling your friends about me, Thanks man!

Yes indeed, its just about finding out what works for you. I have been fortunate to find the perfect combination of pen, marker and sketchbook for my needs (after crazy amounts of trial and error). As soon as I try to switch out any of them it all goes to hell :P
Thank you!

Yes they are expensive indeed but they have pretty much every color there is and I got an art shop close by that have all of them so I just go there and pick whatever I need and by now I got a very wide range of colors that fits me perfectly. I would recommend that you give them another try because they are incredible to use. The big downer is that they run dry really fast if you draw a lot.
